message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can meet you in the middle at $92.50
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $90.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $92
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $92, how about $89.50?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $89.50, but I can do $91.25
I'm willing to meet you halfway between $91.25 and $89.50, how about $90.50?
I'm not willing to budge much more, but I can do $91
I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $90. Please consider this my final offer.
